settings.heading: Why Are We Different?
settings.subheading:
> We Offer Many Conditions of Hardware ... New, New Open Box, OEM Reconditioned, and Used/Reconditioned by us.

> We Are Authorized Partners for Many Brands and Work through Distribution Channels to get the right items for you.

> We also Work Among Worldwide Dealers who have Pockets Of Hardware we can use for You.

> We Buy Back Your Old and Surplus (New as well) and Pay You Outright or can use it for Credit in future purchases.
